column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////This restaurant is still operating during COVID
column2: allowing both dine in and takeout options. Dine-in capacity has been significantly reduced to comply with physical distancing
column3: and they have no-touch menus now. Also all of the staff members wear masks
column4: which I was happy to see. It's very nice inside and has an urban yet upscale vibe.
